summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the West Seattle Freeway; creating the West Seattle Freeway Fund to provide for payment to the Engineering Operating Fund of costs incident to the completion of the West Seattle Freeway Project, depositing funds into the West Seattle Freeway Fund by appropriation and reappropriation and transfer of funds previously allocated by ordinance, State and Federal grants, other governmental agency contributions, sale of limited tax levy general obligation bonds proceeds from Litigation, and/of any other source that may become available for the completion of the West Seattle Freeway Project; and abandoning the unencumbered balance of Ordinance 102766 as amended.
